resources.string: Distinguish between new and seen words at screen. You have unlimited time, but you only have 3 lives that decreases if you choose the wrong answer.
Given 3 lives and unlimited time, how many digits can you recall?
You have 3 lives and unlimited time. Memorize the numbers in forwarding order.
In order to become the martial arts master, you\'ll need quick memorizing skills. This workout may help improve your visual memory. You will trained to memorize a sequence of martial arts moves.
Calculate the mathematical operations as soon as possible, then determine which is the highest. Wrong answer reduces your score.
Calculate and determine whether mathematical operations were correct or wrong. Your score will be reduced if you miscalculate it.
Calculate mathematical operations as fast as possible, then determine the exact value. Don\'t forget, your score will be reduced if you miscalculate it.
Your boss gives you an opportunity for you to get a higher salary. You have 60 seconds to have a negotiate with your boss. How will you win the highest salary?
Remember one back shape that you\'ve seen, then determine whether the current shape is same as the previous or not. Wrong answer reduces score. Be quick and precise!
Determine if the meaning at the top matches the color at the bottom. If you choose the wrong answer, score will be reduced. Be quick and precise!
You are ordered to find a determined object. It\'s like finding a needle in the haystack. Find it as soon as possible!
You must find the most unique object on your screen. Find it as much as possible!
Determine whether the you\'ve seen fact matches question asked. If you choose wrong answer, your score will be reduced. Be quick and logical!

Ddetermine whether the fact you\'ve seen matches question. If you choose wrong answer, your score will be reduced. Be quick and logical! \n[TIP] Vowel letters: A, I, U, E, O. Odd numbers: 1, 3, 5, 7, 9.
You have 90 seconds to guess the day of the week as fast as possible.
You will given a sequence of numbers. Your job is to guess the number at empty box according to pattern.
Could you determine if one box is identical to the other one? Do it as fast as possible. Wrong answer will reduce your score.
If you could rotate one of the other box, could you determine if one box is identical to the other one? Do it in 60 seconds. Wrong answer will reduce your score.

Remember the previous shape. If current shape and it\'s color is same, select Yes. If only the current color that matches the previous one, select Partly. If only the current shape without it\'s color that matches the previous one, select Partly. If no one is same, select No. \nWrong answer reduces score. Be quick and precise!
Do the operations as you do in math. But this is like adding and removing shapes. Can you do it as fast as possible?
